imageDescriptions.description: Scene: Two children step from a city street into a glowing forest at twilight. Character Adrian: 5-7 year old boy, voluminous tousled golden curls, bright blue eyes, pale warm skin, wearing a casual hoodie over a white crewneck shirt—expressive and empathetic; consistent in all scenes. Character Alexander: 8-10 year old boy, short tousled brown hair, bright green eyes, wearing layered hoodie and sleeveless zip vest—energetic and curious. Environment: tall trees with lantern-like glowing sap, light bands across a mossy path, delicate roots forming narrow trails, soft mist. Mood: warm, epic, slightly mysterious. Lighting: warm watercolor glow, dappled with cool shadows. Camera perspective: mid-shot from slightly below eye level to emphasize wonder. Action verbs: stepping, pulling, listening, touching moss. Recurring motifs: light bands and whispering sound. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly.

Scene: Forest path with one child leading confidently and another cautiously following, guided by a majestic stag with a silver-tipped tail. Character Adrian: 5-7 year old boy, voluminous tousled golden curls, bright blue eyes, pale warm skin, wearing a casual hoodie over a white crewneck shirt—gentle and empathetic. Character Alexander: 8-10 year old boy, short tousled brown hair, bright green eyes, layered hoodie and sleeveless zip vest—swift and clever. Animal: Silberhorn the stag—brown fur with a distinctive silver tail tip, bright expressive eyes, noble posture. Environment: soft moss, exposed roots, small carvings on the ground, dappled warm light. Mood: curious, energetic. Lighting: warm shafts, close-up mid-shot on interaction. Action verbs: leading, sniffing, nudging, tracing. Recurring motifs: light bands and whispering melody. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly.

Scene: A sunlit clearing with an elderly woman sitting on a log, an old map booklet open on her lap. Character Frau Müller: 78-year-old woman, professional distinctive face, dark hair, warm expression, green-gray-beige palette—consistent in all scenes; wearing modest, practical clothing. Characters Adrian and Alexander nearby, interacting with her map. Environment: soft grass, light filtering like ribbons, scattered herbs and an old wooden log, map with hand-drawn notes. Mood: wise, protective, warm. Lighting: warm center light, soft edges. Camera perspective: medium shot focusing on interaction and map details. Action verbs: sitting, pointing, scribbling, listening. Recurring motifs: light bands and a musical motif drawn on the map. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly.

Scene: A wooden bridge over a dark, quiet stream guarded by a calm, watchful officer. Character Polizist Paul: 38-year-old, portrait with a magical ethereal appearance and blue aura/glow—consistent magical look in all scenes; standing firm at the bridge. Characters Adrian and Alexander at the entrance to the bridge, Adrian nervous, Alexander supportive. Environment: wooden planks, mossy railing, shimmering blue aura around the officer, soft mist rising from the stream. Mood: tense but kind, moral test atmosphere. Lighting: cool blue accents from the officer's aura, warm bridge glow. Camera perspective: slightly elevated mid-shot focusing on faces and hands. Action verbs: asking, hesitating, singing, listening. Recurring motifs: light and musical motif returning. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly.

Scene: The bridge dissolves into warm glow as a small dragon-like light-being emerges; the children step forward together. Character Adrian: 5-7 year old boy, voluminous tousled golden curls, bright blue eyes, pale warm skin, wearing a casual hoodie over a white crewneck shirt—now confident and comforted. Character Alexander: 8-10 year old boy, short tousled brown hair, bright green eyes, layered hoodie and sleeveless zip vest—cheerful and quick. Animal Silberhorn: majestic stag with silver-tailed tip, calm and protective. Polizist Paul: 38-year-old with ethereal blue aura, smiling kindly. Magical creature Drache Dino: a friendly dragon-like light being with green, yellow, and orange palette, emitting blue magical glow, playful and gentle. Environment: mossy bridge, soft stream, warm light trails guiding home. Mood: warm, poetic, resolved. Lighting: warm central glow with soft blue accents. Camera perspective: wide-shot capturing group unity and the path ahead. Action verbs: singing, emerging, smiling, walking. Recurring motifs: light bands and musical motif culminating. Art style: watercolor illustration, Axel Scheffler style, warm colours, child-friendly.
